sen.j: 谷塩手（たにのしおて、天武天皇元年7月23日 (旧暦)（672年8月21日））は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: TANI no Shiote (year of birth unknown-August 24,672) was one historical figure in the Asuka Period.
TANI no Shiote (year of birth unknown-August 24, 672) was a person from the Asuka Period in Japan.
sen.cmt: one historiacl figure in -> a person from
sen.e: TANI no Shiote (year of birth unknown-August 24, 672) was a person from the Asuka Period in Japan.

sen.j: 旧仮名遣いでの読みは「たにのしほて」。
sen.e: In the old Japanese syllabary way of reading, it was read 'TANI no Shihote'.
In the old Japanese syllabary characters, his name was pronounced 'TANI no Shihote.'
In the old Japanese syllabary characters, his name was pronounced 'TANI no Shihote.'
Kabane (hereditary title) was Atai.
His Kabane (hereditary title) was Atai.
His Kabane (hereditary title) was Atai.

sen.j: 672年の壬申の乱で、大友皇子（弘文天皇）側の将となる。
sen.e: In the Jinshin War 672, TANI became a commander on the Prince OTOMO's side.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: In the Jinshin War which broke out in 672, TANI became a commander of the Prince Otomo's army.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: In the Jinshin War which broke out in 672, TANI became a commander of the Prince Otomo's army.
And he was killed with a sword.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: And he was slain by the enemy.
sen.cmt: 前のスペースを削除しました。訳抜け：敵に
sen.e: And he was slain by the enemy.

sen.j: 谷氏は倭漢氏に属する渡来系の氏族である。
sen.e: The Tani Clan was a member of the immigrants coming from oversea to anciennt Japan belonging to the WAKAN Clan.
The Tani clan was one of the Yamatonoaya clan, the families of immigrants came from overseas to ancient Japan.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。倭漢氏と東漢氏は同じものと解釈し、「やまとのあやうじ」としています。参照：http://www.asahi-net.or.jp/~rg1h-smed/yamatoaya
sen.e: The Tani clan was one of the Yamatonoaya clan, the families of immigrants came from overseas to ancient Japan.

sen.j: 壬申の乱で谷氏は敵味方に分かれた。
sen.e: Some members of TANI Clan took the enemy's side,
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: During the Jinshin War, the Tani clan fought among themselves and became sallies and enemies.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。訳抜け：壬申の乱
sen.e: During the Jinshin War, the Tani clan fought among themselves and became sallies and enemies.

sen.j: 塩手は大友皇子側の将であった。
sen.e: Shiote was the commander of Prince OTOMO' side.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Shiote fought for Prince Otomo as the commander.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: Shiote fought for Prince Otomo as the commander.

sen.j: 7月22日に瀬田で起こった両軍最後の会戦に、塩手も参加したと思われる。
sen.e: Shiote was believed to have taken part in the final battle broke out in Seta on August 22.
Shiote was believed to have taken part in the final battle broke out in Seta on August 23.
sen.cmt: 天武天皇元年7月22日は西暦672年8月23日です。
sen.e: Shiote was believed to have taken part in the final battle broke out in Seta on August 23.

sen.j: 大友皇子を破って粟津岡に陣を敷いた村国男依らは、翌日に粟津市で犬養五十君と谷塩手を斬った。
sen.e: After defeating Prince OTOMO and setting up camp in Kuritsuoka, (村国男依)killed (犬養五十君)and TANI no Shiote with a sword.
sen.cmt: (村国男依） (犬養五十君）読み方不明
sen.e: MURAKUNI no Oyori, after defeating Prince Otomo and setting up a camp in Awazu no Oka, slew INUKAI no Ikimi and TANI no Shiote with his sword on the next day.
sen.cmt: 村国男依：むらくに の おより犬養五十君：いぬかい の いきみ粟津岡：あわずのおかhttp://www.asuka-tobira.com/jinshin/chizu.htm訳抜け：翌日
sen.e: MURAKUNI no Oyori, after defeating Prince Otomo and setting up a camp in Awazu no Oka, slew INUKAI no Ikimi and TANI no Shiote with his sword on the next day.

sen.j: 同じ日に大友皇子が自殺したことで壬申の乱は終わった。
sen.e: Prince OTOMO committed suicide on the same day, that caused the end of the Jinshin War.
Prince Otomo's death, as he committed suicide on the same day, brought an end to the Jinshin War.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: Prince Otomo's death, as he committed suicide on the same day, brought an end to the Jinshin War.

sen.j: 塩手について他に知られることはない。
sen.e: Futher information about him is still not clear.
Further information about him is unknown.
